alert.note: Alert for Berks; Lehigh (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Berks and northwestern Lehigh Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 449 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Friedensburg to near Strausstown to Richland. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reading, Wyomissing, Kutztown, Hamburg, Fleetwood, Sinking Spring, Laureldale, Womelsdorf, Wernersville, Robesonia, Leesport, Shoemakersville, Bernville, Lyons, Strausstown, Lenhartsville, Spring Ridge, New Tripoli, Fairview Hgts and Wanamakers. This includes the following highways... Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 11 and 46. Interstate 176 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 6 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
